== Kuttippuram (CT) (627537) ==

Kuttippuram (CT) is a town in the [[Tirur]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 16.42 sq. km. and harbouring 4901 households with total population of 25750 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 40 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 381 km. Male population is 12120 and female population is 13630. Scheduled Caste population is 2183 and Scheduled Tribes population is 78. Census Location Code of the town is 627537<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 40 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Kuttippuram at a distance of 0 km.
